t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Zing Zang Bloody Mary Mix 32 OZ
s: The Blood Mary we each had was amazing, especially compared to the New England variety we were used to drinking. When we returned home, we e-mailed the Steamboat Company through their website, and they graciously told us what brand of mix they use, and it is Zing Zang.

t: Amazon.com : Zing Zang Bloody Mary Mix, 59.17 Fl Oz (Pack of 3) : Bloody Mary Cocktail Mixes : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: If you are a Bloody Mary fan, this is the best brand. ... I love this product. It has a nice spice to it with hints of celery. Used with bacon salt for the rim and this makes a very good bloody mary. I usually add black pepper, celery salt, Tabasco and worsteshire sauce to complete my drink. I love the 3 pack as I use this mix for my "weekend BM" and don't like running out. ... Was hunting for a great Bloody Mary mix when I found Zing Zang...

s: As Buach "Zing, Zang, Zing" is mehra ois wia nur as Begleitheft zur CD. Es is a richtig pfundigs Liadabuach, wo sogor no mehra Liader drinnastenna, wia auf da CD drauf san. Es is schee aufgmacht, mit Gedichten, Reimen und Buidln. Mir gfoits guad, meim Buam (3 Johr) aa.
